item.title: DevOps Radio Episode 18: Meet Patrick Debois, the Father of DevOps
item.description: In this episode of DevOps Radio, Patrick Debois, CTO of Small Town Heroes and founder of DevOps Days, discusses his vision behind the unification of IT teams through DevOps and the worldwide growth of this cultural IT phenomenon.
